thread.title: Stars of the week
thread.title_full: Stars of the week | Boston Herald

author: Herald Staff
title: Stars of the week
text:
DIVISION 1
•   Bret Edwards threw for 203 yards and three scores as Central Catholic clinched the Merrimack Valley Large title with a 30-14 win over Andover.
• Edmund Kelsey ran for 141 yards and four touchdowns on 12 carries as Brockton rolled past Durfee, 48-27.
• Coby Tippett returned a punt 64 yards for a score, caught a 17-yard TD pass and picked off two passes as Xaverian rolled over Malden Catholic, 42-13.
•    Jared Sklar ran for 205 yards and three TDs as Needham beat Framingham, 33-14.
•    Kendrick Denose ran for 259 yards and four scores as Methuen edged North Andover, 35-34.
• Doug Santos amassed 236 yards and two touchdowns to give Peabody a 21-18 win over Lynn English.
DIVISION 2
•   Randy Alay booted three field goals, including a game-winning 28-yarder on the final play, to give Waltham a 16-14 victory over Lincoln-Sudbury.
• Ben Cassidy ran for 224 yards and three touchdowns, including the game-winner, as Westford Academy defeated Newton South, 21-14.
DIVISION 3
• Mekhai Johnson ran for 291 yards and four TDs to help Belmont top Winchester, 35-28.
• Liam Henning was 10-of-10 passing for 181 yards and a touchdown as Wayland blanked Boston Latin, 34-0.
•   Myles Uva rushed for 225 yards and four touchdowns on 30 carries, as Plymouth North edged Whitman-Hanson, 42-35.
•    Nick Morrison ran for 129 yards and three TDs, and returned a fumble 50 yards for a score, as North Attleboro clinched the Hockomock Kelley-Rex title with a 44-20 win over Taunton.
•   Garret Keough was 13-for-13 for 244 yards and three TDs passing in Marblehead’s 41-7 win over Lynn Classical.
• Lovevindjy Salvant ran for a career-high 295 yards and four scores as Walpole defeated Natick, 42-7.
DIVISION 4
• Jake Eliason rushed for 227 yards and three touchdowns as Bedford rolled to a 35-14 victory over Medford.
• Jake Ragusa had 177 yards and one score as Canton beat Oliver Ames, 40-14.
• C.J. Cooper threw for 211 yards and two scores as Hamilton-Wenham rallied to defeat Amesbury, 21-16.
DIVISION 5
• Marcus McBean rushed for 250 yards and three touchdowns in Archbishop Williams’ 35-0 victory over Austin Prep.
•  The backfield tandem of Mike Trifone and Scott Peary combined for 235 yards and two TDs as Northeast defeated Whittier, 20-14.
•   Nick Landry rushed for 188 yards and two touchdowns as Bishop Stang defeated Coyle & Cassidy, 21-6.
• Jared Vargus had 161 yards and three TDs as East Bridgewater stayed unbeaten with a 37-14 win over Dighton-Rehoboth.
•    Alex Dixon rushed for 219 yards and three touchdowns on 12 carries as Greater New Bedford Voke defeated Case, 47-20.
• Noah Furtado rushed for 144 yards and three scores, caught a TD pass and returned an interception 25 yards for a TD in Fairhaven’s 45-0 win over Bourne.
DIVISION 6
• Josh Pierre-Charles rushed for 126 yards and three scored and added another on a halfback option pass as Millis-Hopedale defeated Ashland, 27-0.
• DeShaun Dias ran for 225 yards and three touchdowns in Mashpee’s 42-14 victory over St. John Paul.
ISL/PREP
• A.J. Dillon rushed for 184 yards and four touchdowns as Lawrence Academy handed St. Sebastian’s its first loss, 47-30.
• Shane Smith recorded 15 tackles as Governor’s Academy remained undefeated with a 39-13 victory over St. Paul’s.
• Omari Davis had 173 yards and three TDs as St. George’s defeated Thayer.
